description:
Vicious. Bleak. Blood and loss. Characters carving their way out of hopeless situation through swords and sacrifice. Attack on Titan is not only a grimdark masterpiece, it’s the finest written T.V. show I’ve ever seen. “It Doesn’t Matter How Strong The Opposition Is. It Doesn’t Matter How Fearsome The World Is, It Doesn’t Matter How […]

The post REVIEW: Attack on Titan Season 1 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Attack on Titan Season 1
